quit.title: Exit Parsec
quit.subtitle: Are you sure you want to exit the application? Mounted workspaces will be unmounted and any import in progress will be cancelled.

globalErrors.incompatibleServer: Your application and the server are not compatible. Online features will not be available. Please check that your application is up-to-date, and if so, contact an administrator.
globalErrors.clientRevoked: You have been revoked from this organization. You can still see some of the data you had access to, but most features of Parsec will not work.
globalErrors.clientFrozen: You have been frozen in this organization. Most features of parsec will not work. Contact an administrator.
globalErrors.organizationNotFound: The organization has not been found on the server. Contact the server's administrator.
globalErrors.expiredOrganization: This organization has expired. Please contact an administrator.
globalErrors.unexpected: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
globalErrors.smallDisplayWarning: We are currently working on small displays for Parsec so it's not yet fully compatible. We strongly recommend that you use a larger display to access it.
globalErrors.incompatibleEnvironment: Your browser is not compatible with Parsec yet.
globalErrors.incompatibleWithSafari: Parsec does not yet support Safari. Please use another browser such as Chrome, Firefox or Edge.

updateRejectedReasons.outsiderLimitedRole: Externals can only be Readers or Contributors
updateRejectedReasons.insufficientRole: Only Managers and Owners can change roles
updateRejectedReasons.managerCannotUpdateManagers: Managers cannot change the role of other managers
updateRejectedReasons.alreadyNotShared: Already not shared with this user

contributor.label: Contributor
contributor.description: Can view, edit, import and delete files.

manager.label: Manager
manager.description: Can manage user access to this workspace.

owner.label: Owner
owner.description: Can manage user access and re-encrypt the workspace. Can promote other users to Owner.

link.orgNotFound: You do not have access to the organization {organization} in which this file is stored.
link.appIsBusy: Parsec is busy. Please close any opened window before clicking on the link again.
link.invalidFileLink: The link provided is not a valid file link.
link.workspaceNotFound: Failed to find the workspace this file belongs to. Maybe it has not been shared with you.
link.fileNotFound: Failed to find the file associated with this link.

errors.offline: Failed to contact the server. Please check your internet connection.

notification.newDeviceAdded: A new device has been added to the organization
notification.serverOnline: You are connected to the Parsec server

notification.clientRevoked: You have been revoked from this organization.

sidebar.tagline: Keep control over your data confidentiality

deleteAccount.title: Delete my account
deleteAccount.description: By deleting your Parsec account, all associated data will also be deleted.

questionModal.title: Send a validation code by email
questionModal.description: In order to delete your Parsec account, you must confirm your action with a code sent by email.

codeModal.title: Enter the verification code to delete your account
codeModal.description: We have sent a verification code to the email address associated with your account.
codeModal.irreversible: This action is irreversible. Once your account is deleted, you will no longer be able to access your data or associated services.

deleteAccount.success: Your account has been successfully deleted.

error.delete: The code is incorrect or has expired.
error.reSentCode: Failed to resend the code to your email address, please check your network.

authentication.title: Authentication
authentication.description: You can change your authentication method at any time.

updateAuthMethod.title: Update authentication method
updateAuthMethod.error: An error occurred while updating the authentication method.
updateAuthMethod.success: Your authentication method has been successfully updated.

topbar.logoutConfirmQuestion: Are you sure you want to log out?
topbar.logoutImportsConfirmQuestion: All imports will be cancelled. Are you sure you want to log out?
topbar.logoutFailed: An error occurred while logging out.
topbar.updateConfirmQuestion: You will be logged out and the application will close. Make sure to save your work before. Do you want to continue?

expiration.hours: Less than one hour | {hours} hours remaining

errors.noStorage: Unable to list or save your organizations: the application storage is not available. Make sure your disk is not running out of space and that you have read and write permissions to Parsec's configuration folder.
errors.noStorageWeb: Unable to list or save your organizations: the application storage is not available. Make sure you're not browsing in private or incognito mode and that this website has enough permissions to access your browser's storage.

HomePage.bmsOrganizationNotFound: Could not find the organization {organization} on this device.

noDevices.titleInvitation: You have received an invitation link?
noDevices.subtitle: Enjoy a cloud experience with the guarantee that your data belongs to you.

webAccess.title: Would you like to access your organization from this browser?
webAccess.subtitle: If you have already joined an organization on Parsec, follow these steps to access it from this browser:

step.one: Launch {application} (desktop app) and {login} to your organization.
step.two: From your account menu (top right), select {myDevices}, then click on {addDevice} and {copyInvitation}.
step.three: {pasteInvitation} below and follow the instructions to set up your web browser.

webAccess.info: Parsec securely stores your access keys in your browser. Make sure that browser storage is enabled and that it is not deleted when you close your browser ({more}).

organizationRequest.title: Pending requests

requestSent.success: Your request to join the organization has been sent.
requestSent.failure: Failed to send the request. Please try again later.

organizationRequest.requestCancelled: Your request to join the organization has been cancelled.
organizationRequest.requestDeleted: Your request to join the organization has been deleted.

pending.title: Organization request pending
pending.message: Your request to join the organization is still pending. Are you sure you want to cancel it?
pending.tooltip: Your request to join this organization is awaiting approval from an Administrator.

rejected.title: Organization request rejected
rejected.message: Your request to join the organization has been rejected by an administrator. Do you want to delete it?
rejected.tooltip: Your request to join this organization has been rejected by an Administrator.

accepted.joinFailure: Failed to join the organization. Please try again later.

errors.customOffline: Failed to contact server. Please make sure you are online and that the server address is valid.

sequester.info: This service (only available at creation) allows to recover all the data of an organization, for example in the event of an inspection.

LongPathsSupportModal.title: Support for long paths
LongPathsSupportModal.labelInfo: Support for long file paths is not activated on your system. Windows will only support paths up to 260 characters, which might cause problems when accessing some files.
LongPathsSupportModal.labelFix: We recommend that your activate the support for long paths on your machine (or ask an administrator to do it). Instructions can be found on {link}.

bugReport.sent: The bug report has been sent. Thank you for your help!

Password.passwordInfo: Your password must be secure and you must remember it. We advise you to create several devices if possible and to share workspaces.
Password.passwordCriteria: Make sure it corresponds to a strong level: avoid repetitions, overly common words and sequences.

Authentication.title: Authentication
Authentication.description: You can change your authentication method at any time.
Authentication.keyringInfo: Authentication will be handled through your system, so you do not have to remember an additional password. Just do not forget to lock your session when you are not in front of your computer!

smartcard.title: Smartcard
smartcard.description: The smartcard should be plugged in and ready to use.

warn.title: Security information
warn.subtitle: Smartcard authentication is considered the most secure method to log in. By changing your authentication method, be mindful that your device security might be compromised.

smartcard.selectInstructions: A pop-up will open, prompting you to choose the certificate.

Authentication.label: Authentication method

subtitles.recoveryFilesMustExistWarning: You must have created a recovery file in order to reset your authentication method.

errors.keyErrorMessage: The secret key does not match the recovery file.
errors.passwordErrorMessage: Passwords do not match or are not strong enough.
errors.saveDeviceErrorMessage: An error has occurred, the device recovery failed.

subtitles.aboutRecoveryFiles: Recovery files allow you to regain access to this organization if you forgot your password or lose your devices.
subtitles.keepFilesSeparate: You will need to save the recovery file and its secret key. Make sure both are not stored in the same place.
subtitles.warningUniqueness: Please note that these files are not stored by Parsec. If you lose one or both, you will need to create a new recovery file.
subtitles.keyExplanation: The secret key is a code that must be used with the recovery file to create a new password.

toasts.fileDownloadOk: The recovery file was successfully downloaded
toasts.keyDownloadOk: The secret key was successfully downloaded

errors.exportFailed: Failed to create a recovery file.

info.title: No matching code
info.subtitle: If you can't find the matching code, quit and start the process over. If the problem persists, please contact your administrator.

start.first: In order to avoid any attack, you will have to be in direct contact with an administrator during the whole onboarding process.
start.secondWithoutPreferredGreeter: You will be welcomed into the organization {organizationName}. Please contact an administrator to start the process.
start.secondWithPreferredGreeter: You will be welcomed into the organization {organizationName}. Please contact {greeter} ({greeterEmail}) or another administrator to start the process.
start.secondWithGreeterReady: The administrator {greeter} ({greeterEmail}) is ready to welcome you into the organization {organizationName}.

finish.first: You can now log in to Parsec.
finish.second: We strongly recommend creating a recovery file in case you forget your password or lose access to your device.

unknown.description: You are about to add a user with an unknown certificate. Their identity cannot be verified. Are you sure you want to proceed?

notValid.title: Adding a user with an invalid certificate
notValid.description: The certificate provided by the user does not match the root certificate. Are you sure you want to add this user?

linkCopiedToClipboard.success: PKI link has been copied to clipboard.
linkCopiedToClipboard.failed: Failed to copy the PKI link. Your browser or device does not seem to support copy/paste.

AboutPage.title: About
AboutPage.description: Get application information and latest changes.

ReportBugModal.title: Report a bug
ReportBugModal.subtitle: If you encountered a problem using the app, you can report it to our development team.

log.title: Include logs to help better understand the problem.
log.description: Logs may contain sensitive data (file names, folder names, or workspace names).

subtitles.claimDevice: You must have Parsec open on both devices during the onboarding process.
subtitles.getCode: Click on the code you see on the main device.
subtitles.provideCode: On the main device, click on the code you see below.
subtitles.authentication: Lastly, choose an authentication method for your new device.
subtitles.done: The device has been created and added to this organization. You can now use it to connect to Parsec.

ClaimDeviceModal.cancelConfirmSubtitle: Are you sure you want to cancel the process? Information will not be saved, you will have to restart.
ClaimDeviceModal.successMessage: You can now access your organization from your new device.

errors.saveDeviceFailed: Failed to save the information, please try again
errors.sendDeviceInfoFailed: Failed to send information to the host, please restart the onboarding process.
errors.invalidCodeSelected: You did not select the correct code. Please restart the onboarding process.
errors.noneCodeSelected: If you did not see the correct code, this could be a sign of a security issue during the onboarding. Please restart the process.

greeter.invalidSasCode: The code selected on the other device is incorrect.
greeter.manuallyCancelled: The process has been cancelled from the other device.
greeter.default: An error has occurred. The process has been cancelled.

MyProfilePage.systemAuthentication: This session is handled with the authentication of your system.

errors.failedToRetrieveInformation: Failed to retrieve information. Please make sure you are online.

OrganizationRecovery.title: Organization recovery files
OrganizationRecovery.advice: We strongly recommend creating recovery files for each organization.
OrganizationRecovery.adviceDone: You have already created recovery files.

done.subtitle: Recovery files allow you to regain access to this organization if you forgot your password or lose your devices.
done.subtitle2: Without recovery files, you will not be able to recover your account in such a case, and you will need to be re-invited to the organization.
done.subtitle3: They consist of a recovery file and a recovery key. You need to save both in a secure place, if possible in separate places, as both are needed to recover a device's access to an organization.
done.recreateQuestionMessage: You have already created recovery files in the past. Do you want to create new ones?

notDone.subtitle: Recovery files allow you to regain access to this organization if you forgot your password or lose your devices.
notDone.subtitle2: Without recovery files, you will not be able to recover your account in such a case, and you will need to be re-invited to the organization.

organizationName.tooLong: Name is too long, limit is 32 characters.
organizationName.forbiddenCharacters: Only letters, digits, underscores and hyphens. No spaces.

claimLink.missingAction: Link does not include an action.
claimLink.missingToken: Link does not include a token.

claimUserLink.missingAction: Link does not include an action.
claimUserLink.missingToken: Link does not include a token.

claimDeviceLink.missingAction: Link does not include an action.
claimDeviceLink.missingToken: Link does not include a token.

bootstrapLink.missingAction: Link does not include an action.
bootstrapLink.missingToken: Link does not include a token.

msChoosePasswordInput.description: Your password must be secure and you must remember it. We advise you to create several devices if possible and to share workspaces.

UserSelect.defaultPlaceholder: Name or email of the person
UserSelect.queryFailed: An error prevents us from listing the users.

loginPage.title: My Parsec account

subtitle.default: Enter your details to begin registration.
subtitle.codeSubtitle: A verification code has been sent to your email address. Please enter it to continue.
subtitle.authenticationSubtitle: Choose an authentication method to log in to your account.

createAccount.welcomeDescription: Your Parsec Share account has been created successfully. You now have access to Parsec.

errors.accountCreationOkLoginFailed: Your account has been created but we could not log you in automatically.
errors.offline: Failed to contact server. Please make sure you are online.
errors.offlineOrIncorrectServer: Failed to contact server. Please make sure you are online or that the server address is correct.
errors.invalidEmail: This email is not recognized as a valid email.

step1.title: Recover your account
step1.description: Please enter the email address used for your account to proceed.

step2.title: Email Verification
step2.description: A verification code has been sent to your email address. Please enter it to update your password.
step2.info: If you do not receive the code, please check your spam or junk folder.

step3.title: Choose your new password
step3.description: Make sure your new password meets the minimum strength criteria.

step4.title: Your password has been updated
step4.description: You can now log in using your new password!

error.generic: Could not recover your account. Please check your email address.
error.invalidCode: The verification code is invalid, make sure you entered the correct code.
error.offline: You are offline. Please make sure you are connected to the Internet and try again.

loginPage.loginFailed: Failed to log in. Please check your email and password.
loginPage.storeAccountTitle: Store this device to Parsec Account
loginPage.storeAccountQuestion: This device is not stored in Parsec Account. Do you want to store it so that it'll be available everywhere?
loginPage.storeSuccess: The device has been stored in Parsec Account.
loginPage.storeFailed: Could not store the device to Parsec Account

app.titleLinkOrganization: Link your customer account to your new organization
app.titleLogin: Log in to your customer account
app.loginFailed: Cannot log in. Please check your email and password.
app.networkFailed: Could not reach the server. Make sure that you are online and try again.
app.retrieveInformationFailed: Failed to retrieve your personal information from the server.

getEmailStep.title: Forgot password
getEmailStep.description: No worries, we will help you reset your password.
getEmailStep.error: Could not reset your password. Please check your email address.

sidebar.logoutConfirmQuestion: Do you want to log out?

authentication.validateSubtitle: You should have received a code on your new email address.
authentication.newEmailMustBeDifferent: The new email must be different from the current one.

newPasswordStep.title: Choose your new password

newPasswordStep.invalidPassword: The new password format is invalid.

paymentMethodsPage.noAdditionalPaymentMethods: You haven't added additional payment methods.

addPaymentMethod.successButSetDefaultFailed: The card was successfully added but it could not be set as the default payment method.

stopSubscription.title: Would you like to stop your subscription?

payment.title: Payment method

processing.title: Welcome to your customer area

processing.stepDescription: Our teams are processing your request. We'll get in touch shortly to accurately define your needs.

processing.title: Exchange with the sales department

confirmed.title: Order confirmed

invoiceToBePaid.title: Invoice to be paid
invoiceToBePaid.description: Your organization will be available upon payment of the invoice.

organizationAvailable.title: Organization available

standby.title: Order in standby

cancel.title: Order cancelled

titles.tooLongToOpen: The file is taking too long to open

errors.informationEditDownload: If you want to edit this file, you can download it and open it locally on your device.
errors.informationPreviewDownload: If you want to preview this file, you can download it and open it locally on your device.

errors.tooLongToOpenOnDesktop: You can try opening it with default app (right click on file > 'Open with default app').

errors.fileNameMissing: The file name is empty or missing.
errors.fileIdMissing: The file ID is missing or empty.
errors.fileDataMissing: The file data is missing or empty.

advices.title: Some tips to help resolve this issue
advices.advice1: Check that the file can be opened from an external application.
advices.advice3: If the file used to open properly, try restoring a previous version (through file history)

saving.tooltipOffline: You are offline, changes cannot be saved.

subtitle.download: If you want to edit this file, you can download it and open it locally on your device.
